title: Connecting to League servers
body: I was playing on my recently new bought laptop, and everything was fine, with a few lag spikes (which i've somewhat expected because of my internet), but at the end of a game, when it was loading the stats of players, it took a long time which made me restart league. My first re-log worked but i wasn't able to reconnect to servers, and the 2nd time i tried to reconnect to the servers, i wasn't even able to make it pass the login screen. When I typed my username and password in, it went to "Logging In..." as if i has connected but after a while it timed out and showed the error message

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time keeping a firm connection to the servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common fixes for various local settings that often conflict with League, and I believe this is a great starting point in resolving this.

Let me know if you still have issues with your connection after taking those steps.
